title: An Unfortunate And Tragic Day - 7/11
content:
Mumbai blasts 

My prayers for the speedy recovery of the injured and my heartfelt condolences to the victims of the blasts and their families. 

If you are looking for any information or assistance to locate your loved ones in Mumbai, the following websites by bloggers of Mumbai might be of help to you!
 
For more info and updates:-  Mumbai Help and Sameer's Blog

A few pictures of the Mumbai blasts

I request bloggers to provide a link to the above websites from your respective blogs. Thank you !

Thank you Indira
